turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, how are you? I would like to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Well, I was wondering I wanted to order the cinnamon shortbread cream Frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: looks like that's a seasonal item, and isn't currently available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, then instead of that, I am looking at the mini. Can I have Can I have a Double Chocolate Chip Crème Frappuccino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you would like to order a venti double chocolate chip cream frappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Can you add two splendors and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. No. I would like to place the order at the Starbucks in New Brunswick. I think the one that is near Harvest Moon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order is a venti double chocolate chip cream frappuccino, add two splendors and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said you wanted that ordered at starbucks in new brunswick.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks in new brunswick in new jersey. it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help.
